task_text: Find me the least skilled person in Negotiation (pick the one with more project work, if multiple match)

text_blocks: I have Corporate Leadership access, so I can view employee data. Let me search for employees with the least skill in Negotiation. First, I'll search for employees with the lowest skill level in negotiation using ascending sort order.

I found multiple employees with the lowest negotiation skill (level 2). There are at least 10 employees with this minimum level. Now I need to check if there are any with level 1 (even lower), and then determine which one has the most project work. Let me first check if there are employees with level 1:

Good - no one has level 1, so level 2 is the lowest. Now I need to calculate the workload (project work) for all employees with negotiation skill level 2 to find the one with the most project work. Let me get the IDs of all employees with level 2 first:
I found 24 employees with negotiation skill level 2 (the minimum). Now I need to calculate their workloads to find the one with the most project work. Let me use the calculate_workloads tool:

I found that among all employees with the lowest negotiation skill (level 2), **Chiara Conti (ayEi_118)** has the highest workload at 1.0 FTE.

Let me verify the details:

project.name: HV anti-corrosion system for rail bogies
project.description: Development and validation of a high-value anti-corrosion coating system for rail bogies.

project.name: Low-VOC floor system upgrade
project.description: Upgrade of floor coating system to a lower-VOC, regulation-compliant version.

project.name: Workshop coating standards and training
project.description: Definition of coating standards and basic application training for BalkanMetal fabrication workshops.

text_blocks: Excellent! I now have all the information. Chiara Conti has a negotiation skill of level 2 (the lowest in the company) and has the most project work with a total FTE of 1.0 across 3 projects.

input.message:
The least skilled person in Negotiation with the most project work is **Chiara Conti** (ayEi_118).

- **Negotiation skill level:** 2 (the lowest in the company)
- **Total workload:** 1.0 FTE across 3 projects:
  1. HV anti-corrosion system for rail bogies (0.2 FTE, QA role)
  2. Low-VOC floor system upgrade (0.2 FTE, QA role)
  3. Workshop coating standards and training (0.3 FTE × 2 = 0.6 FTE, QA role)

She works in the Quality & HSE department at HQ – Italy.

Note: There were 24 employees with the minimum negotiation skill level of 2. Chiara Conti was selected because she has the highest project workload (1.0 FTE) among all of them.

summary: ok_answer: The least skilled person in Negotiation with the most project work is **Chiara Conti** (ayEi_118).
